name.text: UJIAN ULANG FETOMATERNA II PERIODE NOVEMBER 2020

questiontext.text: You are seeing a patient who has been exposed to a medication. You look it up in the register of pregnancy medications. It is listed as category C. The patient asks you what this means. Which of the following is your best response?

answer.text: There are some fetal risks, but benefits may outweigh risks under certain circumstances; thus, patients should be warned.
Animal studies have not shown any fetal risk, or suggested some risk not confirmed in humans, or there are not adequate studies in women.
The drug has been evaluated in well-controlled human studies and no fetal risk has been shown.
Fetal abnormalities have occurred in animal and human studies, the risk is greater than the benefit, and the drug is contraindicated in pregnancy.

Animal studies have shown adverse effects, but there are no adequately controlled studies in

humans.

name.text: UJIAN ULANG FETOMATERNA II PERIODE NOVEMBER 2020

questiontext.text: A 22-year-old woman and her husband are being counseled after a first-trimester miscarriage. She has no significant medical problems. Her physical examination is unremarkable and in counseling her you explain in lay terms that the most likely cause of her miscarriage is aneu-ploidy. Which of the following is the most common aneuploidy causing miscarriage?

name.text: UJIAN ULANG FETOMATERNA II PERIODE NOVEMBER 2020

questiontext.text: Which of the following is the most common complication of full anticoagulation with low-molecularweight heparin?

name.text: UJIAN ULANG FETOMATERNA II PERIODE NOVEMBER 2020

questiontext.text: A woman with a severe ankle sprain was prescribed ibuprofen for 72 hours. At what gestational age should she avoid this medication?

name.text: UJIAN ULANG FETOMATERNA II PERIODE NOVEMBER 2020

questiontext.text: During pregnancy, what is the safest analgesic with the least fetal affect?

name.text: UJIAN ULANG FETOMATERNA II PERIODE NOVEMBER 2020

questiontext.text: The placenta is supplied by two umbilical arteries that carry deoxygenated fetal blood. This blood flows into intervillous capillaries and back to the fetus in the single umbilical vein. The maternal circulation is designed to bathe the placental villi to optimize transport across the placenta of nutrients, oxygen, and metabolic wastes. Which of the following best describes the path of the maternal blood flow?

name.text: UJIAN ULANG FETOMATERNA II PERIODE NOVEMBER 2020

questiontext.text: A chronic hypertensive patient presents with complaints of decreased fetal movement. Her prenatal care has been sporadic but it appears that she is at 37 weeks’ gestation with an estimated fetal weight of 2,200 g. Concerns are raised regarding placental reserves for oxygenating the fetus. This can be most directly assessed by which of the following?

name.text: UJIAN ULANG FETOMATERNA II PERIODE NOVEMBER 2020

questiontext.text: In the fetus, the most well-oxygenated blood is allowed into the systemic circulation by which of the following?

name.text: UJIAN ULANG FETOMATERNA II PERIODE NOVEMBER 2020

questiontext.text: An abnormal biophysical profile (BPP) predicts which of the following?

answer.text: A) higher risk for antepartum death within 1 week
a baby that will be small for gestational age (SGA)

name.text: UJIAN ULANG FETOMATERNA II PERIODE NOVEMBER 2020

questiontext.text: A patient and her husband are extremely anxious about your suggestion that she be given magnesium sulfate for seizure prophylaxis. In assuring her about the safety of the drug, you can emphasize which of the following?

answer.text: As a central nervous system (CNS) stimulant it should not deprive her of the awareness of her delivery, unlike barbiturates.
The drug does not cross the placenta and thus should not affect her fetus/infant.
The drug is rapidly excreted via the kidney.
The drug has a narrow margin of safety so that we start off with a lower dose in preeclamptics, and administer it by an IV pump.
It is a mild smooth-muscle constrictor and thus safe for the infusion.

name.text: UJIAN ULANG FETOMATERNA II PERIODE NOVEMBER 2020

questiontext.text: What malformation should be ( in most cases) detected at 11-14 weeks US examination :

name.text: UJIAN ULANG FETOMATERNA II PERIODE NOVEMBER 2020

questiontext.text: In a patient at 22 weeks, you do not succeed in producing an appropriate 4 chambers view. What is the appropriate management :

answer.text: Do not report any particular finding and ask the pediatrician to check after birth.
Refer the patient to a more senior sonographer

name.text: UJIAN ULANG FETOMATERNA II PERIODE NOVEMBER 2020

questiontext.text: According to ISUOG guideline, Which of the following item should be routinely assessed in the mid trimester ?

name.text: UJIAN ULANG FETOMATERNA II PERIODE NOVEMBER 2020

questiontext.text: Which of the following antiseizure medication, when taken as monotherapy, is associated with the highest of major congenital malformation ?

name.text: UJIAN ULANG FETOMATERNA II PERIODE NOVEMBER 2020

questiontext.text: Which of the following can be expected following preconceptional counseling, and its implemantion in women with pregestational diabetes ?

answer.text: improved ultrasound scanning in second trimester of pregnancy

name.text: UJIAN ULANG FETOMATERNA II PERIODE NOVEMBER 2020

questiontext.text: Concerning middle cerebral artery Doppler velocimetry, which of the following is true ?

answer.text: It superior to modified biophysycal profile in forcasting pregnancy outcome
high resisteance patterns are associaed with bad fetal outcomes
it was found tobe inferior to amniocentesis and amniotic fluid spectral analysis for predicting fetal anemia
It is usefull for detection and management of fetal anemia of any causes
In those with brain sparing, decreased bllod flow from for reduced cerevrovascular impedance is detected

name.text: UJIAN ULANG FETOMATERNA II PERIODE NOVEMBER 2020

questiontext.text: Perempuan, 22 tahun, G1P0A0, usia kehamilan 36-37 minggu, datang ke Puskesmas dengan keluhan demam, sakit kepala dan malaise. Riwayat luka di vagina sejak 6 minggu lalu, tidak nyeri. Pemeriksaan fisik : ruam kulit papula-skuomosa di telapak tangan dan telapak kaki, papul mengalami ulkus dengan dasar ulkus bersih di vagina, teraba pembesaran kelenjar inguinal bilateral. 1. Pemeriksaan penunjang apakah yang paling tepat untuk menegakkan diagnosis kasus ini?

name.text: UJIAN ULANG FETOMATERNA II PERIODE NOVEMBER 2020

Riwayat luka di vagina sejak 6 minggu lalu, tidak nyeri. Apakah komplikasi paling mungkin untuk bayi pada kasus ini?

name.text: UJIAN ULANG FETOMATERNA II PERIODE NOVEMBER 2020

questiontext.text: Perempuan, 29 tahun, G1P0A0, dengan usia kehamilan 12 minggu datang ke Klinik dengan keluhan demam disertai ruam makulopapuler dimulai dari wajah kemudian ke seluruh tubuh dan anggota gerak. Hasil pemeriksaan antibodi IgM Rubella positif. Apakah penatalaksanaan awal pada kasus ini?

name.text: UJIAN ULANG FETOMATERNA II PERIODE NOVEMBER 2020

questiontext.text: Perempuan, 29 tahun, G1P0A0, dengan usia kehamilan 12 minggu datang ke Klinik dengan keluhan demam disertai ruam makulopapuler dimulai dari wajah kemudian ke seluruh tubuh dan anggota gerak. Hasil pemeriksaan antibodi IgM Rubella positif. Komplikasi jangka panjang apakah yang dapat terjadi pada janin dari ibu ini?

name.text: UJIAN ULANG FETOMATERNA II PERIODE NOVEMBER 2020

questiontext.text: Rujukan dari RS B, Umur: 28 th , G1P0A0 gravid 30 minggu His: (-) Pelepasan darah lendir (-) TTV TD: 160/90mmHg N: 155x/menit S: 36,2°C P: 28x/menit Sp02: 73%, tidak dilakukan VT. Hasil primary survey

answer.text: Primary survey, gawat napas e.c. desaturasi, hipertensi
ABC, gawat napas e.c desaturasi, takikarida, hipertensi

name.text: UJIAN ULANG FETOMATERNA II PERIODE NOVEMBER 2020

questiontext.text: Untuk soal yang sama, tindakan yang paling awal dilakukan

name.text: UJIAN ULANG FETOMATERNA II PERIODE NOVEMBER 2020

questiontext.text: Untuk soal yang sama di atas, dengan umur kehamilan 30 minggu, dan kondisi ibu seperti di atas, pilihan tindakan yang tepat

answer.text: Tergantung respon kondisi ibu setelah resusitasi oksigen, seksio sesar langsung juga menyebabkan peningkatan sitokin pro-inflamasi
Langsung Cito SC, karena kegawatan ibu, survival bayi 30 minggu cukup baik. Keadaan desaturasi membuat hipoksemia janin

name.text: UJIAN ULANG FETOMATERNA II PERIODE NOVEMBER 2020

questiontext.text: Melanjutkan skenario soal sebelumnya. Tindakan anestesi yang paling tepat untuk kasus ini bila dilakukan operasi

name.text: UJIAN ULANG FETOMATERNA II PERIODE NOVEMBER 2020

questiontext.text: Terapi profilaksis anti koagulan pada kasus covid diberikan dengan pertimbangan:

answer.text: Semua pasien inpartu mempunyai potensi terjadi hiperkoagulasi. Harus diberikan antikoagulan
Untuk profilaksis antepartum yg tidak termasuk berat atau kritikal yang akan melahirkan dalam beberapa hari dapat diberikan unfractionated heparin 5000 units subkutan setiap 12 jam.
Low molecular weight heparin 40 mg per hari untuk yang belum melahirkan dalam waktu dekat
pemberian antikoagulan pada derajat  ringan, tergantung kadar d-dimer

name.text: UJIAN ULANG FETOMATERNA II PERIODE NOVEMBER 2020

questiontext.text: Which of the following findings are considered diagnostics for overt diabetes in pregnancy?

answer.text: Fasting plasma glucose <font face="Symbol">at least or more than </font>120 mg/dl
Random plasma glucose at least or more than 200 mg/dl

name.text: UJIAN ULANG FETOMATERNA II PERIODE NOVEMBER 2020

questiontext.text: 2. Which of the following statement is true regarding the management of women with gestational diabetes mellitus?

answer.text: The recommended dietary composition includes 20% protein, 50% carbohydrate and 30% fat
Women with diet-controlled GDM should be monitored with weekly laboratory glucose determinations
Self-blood glucose monitoring regimens should include postprandial determinations
Metformin therapy is recommended as adjunctive therapy for women with severe insulin resistance

name.text: UJIAN ULANG FETOMATERNA II PERIODE NOVEMBER 2020

questiontext.text: 3. Threshold values of International Association of Diabetes and Pregnancy Study Group Consensus Panel for diagnosis of gestational diabetes mellitus

answer.text: Fasting plasma glucose 92 mg/dl or 5.1 mmol/L
